thread.title: Buhari fit as a fiddle – Dogara
thread.title_full: Buhari fit as a fiddle – Dogara

author: Taiwo Ojoye
title: Buhari fit as a fiddle – Dogara
text: Buhari fit as a fiddle – Dogara Published Tweet John Ameh, Abuja The Speaker of the House of Representatives, Mr. Yakubu Dogara, said on Thursday that he met President Muhammadu Buhari fit in London. Dogara, the President of the Senate, Bukola Saraki, and the Leader of the Senate, Ahmed Lawan, had paid Buhari a visit in London on Wednesday. On Thursday, the Speaker took to his Twitter handle, @YakubDogara, to say that the political leaders discussed national issues. He also stated that Buhari shared jokes with the visitors. But, Dogara failed to mention the particular national issues discussed or the topics of Buhari’s jokes. Some of his tweets were, “President is as fit as a fiddle. After burning national issues, it was all PMB’s vintage humorous jokes. I’m so elated he is as fit as a fiddle.” Dogara’s media aide, Mr. Turaki Hassan, also quoted the speaker in a statement as describing Buhari as “fit as a fiddle.”
